Headline: #35 31st/35th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 35th/Cottage Grove
ShortDescription: Due to extremely heavy traffic and crowding at the beach, Eastbound #35 31st/35th buses will only provide service up to 35th/Cottage Grove.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Due to extremely heavy traffic and crowding at the beach, Eastbound #35 31st/35th buses will only provide service up to 35th/Cottage Grove.

Eastbound buses will operate via 35th, Rhodes, 33rd Place, Cottage Grove (await recovery time).

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #55 Garfield Temporary Westbound Reroute near 55th/Lake Park
ShortDescription: Westbound 55 Garfield  buses are temporarily rerouted via 55th, Museum of Science and Industry, Lake Park & 55th: due to, street blockage near 55th/Lake Park.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #55 Garfield  buses are temporarily rerouted via 55th, Museum of Science and Industry, Lake Park & 55th: due to, street blockage near 55th/Lake Park.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
